email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 20-25. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Could you consider revising to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s availability for the laycan? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve checked with the owner, and they’re willing to adjust the rate to $51.00 per metric ton. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed available for the laycan of October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the full vessel details and draft contract for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ve attached the full vessel details and draft contract for your review. Let me know if you need any clarifications. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the documents. Everything looks in order. We’ll proceed with the contract as discussed. Please confirm the laycan once more, and we’ll finalize the paperwork. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed—the laycan remains October 20-25. I’ll send over the finalized contract shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if anything else comes up. Best, Sarah
